function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 due to inadequate IAQ measures","Impact":"Increased risk of disease contagion and transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing IAQ optimization measures and using non-pharmaceutical methods","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, UV germicidal lamps","People":"Occupants of confined spaces, general public","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of social distancing and quarantine measures","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread within households and public gatherings","Mitigation":"Strict implementation of social distancing and quarantine guidelines","Technologies":"Public education, monitoring and enforcement","People":"General public, households, public gathering organizers","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Environmental pollution due to lockdown measures","Impact":"Reduction in air and water pollution due to shutdown of transportation and industrial sectors","Mitigation":"Transition to sustainable and low-impact industrial and transportation practices","Technologies":"Renewable energy, low-emission vehicles, green infrastructure","People":"General public, environmental advocates","Owner":"Government agencies, industrial and transportation sectors"}]}
